description: For campfire hangs, beach wanders, and chilly strolls on neighborhood trails when a shirt is too little and a heavyweight jacket too much, enter: this enigmatic shacket. It's 100% lightweight cotton, but added insulating warmth keeps you cozy when the temps take a dip. A boyfriend fit keeps it modern with jeans, plus snap closures throughout for an update to the standard flannel flair.
name: Dolores Insulated Flannel Shacket - Womens
